name: Pilferer
description:
Description

Pilferer - is a casual adventure of a small thief who tries to steal precious stones from pirates. At each level, you need to collect 3 gems to go to the next level. The pirates themselves will be waiting for you differently, who will try to kill you, the stakes they have put, various traps, poisonous mushrooms. Each level is special and it can be traversed in several ways, so experiment, sometimes you need to avoid fighting again. Good luck!

Features

-Interesting gameplay

-Beautiful graphics

-Varied levels

-Easy and intuitive operation
